      • transferClassAssignment

        public java.lang.String transferClassAssignment(java.lang.String problemSetId,
                                       java.lang.String stuClassRef,
                                       java.lang.String partnerExternalRef,
                                       java.lang.String partnerAccessToken,
                                       java.lang.String note)
        Description copied from interface: AssignmentService
        Transfer the assignment from Partner to ASSISTments. First it checks if partnerExternalRef already exists. If it doesn't, a new assignment will be created inside ASSISTments. Store the association between new ASSISTments assignment and Partner assignment into database. If it does exist, external reference for this assignment will be fetched from database.
        Specified by:
        transferClassAssignment in interface AssignmentService
        Parameters:
        problemSetId - -- problem set id from ASSISTments
        stuClassRef - -- external reference for the student class from ASSISTments
        partnerExternalRef - -- partner external reference for the assignment from Partner
        partnerAccessToken - -- partner access token for the assignment from Partner
        note - -- To keep extra information
        Returns:
        external reference for the assignment from ASSISTments

      • createClassAssignment

        public java.lang.String createClassAssignment(java.lang.String problemSetId,
                                     java.lang.String classRef,
                                     java.lang.String partnerExternalRef,
                                     java.lang.String partnerAccessToken,
                                     java.lang.String note)
        Description copied from interface: AssignmentService
        Create a new assignment inside ASSISTments. Store the association between ASSISTments assignment and Partner assignment into database. It doesn't check if Partner assignment already exists
        Specified by:
        createClassAssignment in interface AssignmentService
        Parameters:
        problemSetId - -- problem set id from ASSISTments
        partnerExternalRef - -- partner external reference for the assignment from Partner
        partnerAccessToken - -- partner access token for the assignment from Partner
        note - -- To keep extra information
        Returns:
        external reference for the assignment from ASSISTments

      • getAssignment

        public java.lang.String getAssignment(java.lang.String assignmentRef,
                             java.lang.String onExit)
        Description copied from interface: AssignmentService
        Get the URL needed to run the assignment using ASSISTments' Tutor
        Specified by:
        getAssignment in interface AssignmentService
        Parameters:
        assignmentRef - -- External reference for the assignment from ASSISTments
        onExit - -- After running the required assignment, the Tutor redirects to this URL.
        Returns:
        encoded URL

      • find

        public java.util.List<PartnerToAssistments> find(PartnerToAssistments.ColumnNames cn,
                                        java.lang.String value)
                                          throws ReferenceNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: AssignmentService
        Find a certain external assignment based on column name and value
        Specified by:
        find in interface AssignmentService
        Parameters:
        cn - -- column name. It comes from table partner_to_assistments_links (partner_external_references)
        value - -- value for the column
        Returns:
        a list of external assignment
        Throws:
        ReferenceNotFoundException - -- If nothing is found, this exception will be thrown out.

      • isExternalAssignmentExists

        public boolean isExternalAssignmentExists(java.lang.String partnerExternalRef)
        Description copied from interface: AssignmentService
        Check if Partner assignment already exists based on partner_external_reference
        Specified by:
        isExternalAssignmentExists in interface AssignmentService
        Parameters:

        Returns:
